Bash(/tmp/debug_workout.sql <<'EOF'
-- Get a specific Week 1 Monday workout with its exercises
SELECT 
    w.id as workout_id,
    w.name as workout_name,
    we.id as workout_exercise_id,
    we.exercise_order,
    we.superset_group,
    ec.name as exercise_name,
    we.prescribed_sets
FROM workouts w
LEFT JOIN workout_exercises we ON we.workout_id = w.id
LEFT JOIN exercise_cards ec ON ec.id = we.exercise_card_id
WHERE w.name = 'Monday - Week 1 (7-Jul)'
ORDER BY we.exercise_order;
EOF)
Bash(bash -c 'export SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=""sbp_v0_5281f496aa2b4ac3b704715c6b5ef53da39772d7""; npx supabase functions deploy analyze-video --project-ref xaknhwxfkcxtqjkwkccn --use-api --yes')
Bash(powershell -Command "npx supabase migration repair --status applied 002; npx supabase migration repair --status applied 003")
Bash(powershell -Command "echo Y | npx supabase db push")
Bash(powershell -Command "npx supabase db execute --remote ''SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''''profiles'''' AND table_schema = ''''public''''''")
Bash(powershell -Command "npx supabase db dump --schema public --data-only --table profiles 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 50")
Bash(powershell -Command "npx supabase db dump --schema public -f temp_schema.sql; Select-String -Path temp_schema.sql -Pattern ''CREATE TABLE.*profiles'' -Context 0,20")
Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "npx supabase functions deploy analyze-video --project-ref xaknhwxfkcxtqjkwkccn --use-api --yes")
